quoteText:
We claim no ownership rights over User Content created by you.
The User Content you create remains yours.
however, by sharing User Content through the Service, you agree to allow others to view, edit, and/or share your User Content in accordance with this Agreement (see “User Content License Grants” below).
title: You maintain ownership of your data

tosdr.case: You maintain ownership of your data
tosdr.tldr: In the terms of service, the service states "We claim no ownership rights over User Content created by you. The User Content you create remains yours; however, by sharing User Content through the Service, you agree to allow others to view, edit, and/or share your User Content in accordance with this Agreement", which states that the company takes no ownership for any content posted by you. However, it grants other users the rights to view,  modify, or share your created content
